description: Ancient ruins hidden beneath Upper Yard in Skypiea, containing secrets of the lost city of Shandora and the Void Century.

keyEvents.event: Luffy falls into the underground ruins after being swallowed by a giant python
keyEvents.significance: Discovery of ancient ruins sets up archaeological mystery subplot and connection to Void Century

reveals.reveal: Existence of underground ruins beneath Upper Yard containing ancient secrets

keyEvents.event: Luffy battles Wyper with the Burn Bazooka being unveiled
keyEvents.significance: Major combat showcasing Dial technology and warrior skills

keyEvents.event: Yama defeats Genbo using Axe Mountain technique
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates power hierarchy within God's Army forces

keyEvents.event: Hotori and Kotori make their first appearance
keyEvents.significance: Introduction of new antagonists to the battlefield

keyEvents.event: Enel appears on the ship and confronts the crew
keyEvents.significance: First direct confrontation between Enel and Straw Hat crew members

keyEvents.event: Enel reveals his goal to find the City of Gold
keyEvents.significance: Major plot revelation about Enel's motivations

keyEvents.event: Enel defeats both Sanji and Usopp
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates Enel's overwhelming power and creates crisis for the crew

keyEvents.event: Enel leaves Hotori and Kotori to fight Nami and Gan Fall
keyEvents.significance: Sets up upcoming battle on the ship

keyEvents.event: Nami and Gan Fall prepare for battle against the twin brothers
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates crew's resilience despite overwhelming odds
